verbs.description: Boeing 's plans to [V: sell] [ARG1: commercial jetliners] [ARG2: to Iran] appears safe for now despite President Donald Trump 's new campaign to " fix " the 2015 nuclear deal .
Boeing 's plans to sell commercial jetliners to Iran [V: appears] [ARG1: safe] [ARGM-TMP: for now] [ARGM-ADV: despite President Donald Trump 's new campaign to " fix " the 2015 nuclear deal] .
Boeing 's plans to sell commercial jetliners to Iran appears safe for now despite [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's] new campaign to " [V: fix] " [ARG1: the 2015 nuclear deal] .
